availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Powell (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Son of Lucy Powell. Married to Sarah A. Hundley Powell in Henry County, Kentucky, on July 19, 1864. Resident of Henry County in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 380A-B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, p. 490.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Henry County, KY, July 1863, p. 391.
